# Blogs Application Project

A comprehensive React TypeScript application for viewing and managing blogs and users using JSONPlaceholder API.

## Features
- Home page with navigation
- Blogs listing with search and sort functionality
- Users listing with search and sort functionality
- Individual blog and user detail views
- Comments system
- Responsive design
- Global search functionality
- Modern UI with animations and responsive design

## Progress Status
- [x] Project initialization
- [x] Component structure setup
- [x] API integration
- [x] Feature implementation
- [x] Styling and polish
- [x] Testing and deployment ready

## Tech Stack
- React 18 with TypeScript
- React Router DOM
- Custom CSS with responsive design
- JSONPlaceholder API integration
- Custom hooks for data management

## Available at
- Development: http://localhost:3001
- Production build ready in `/build` folder
